bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition referring to five types of ye bing 噎病 , gullet occlusion disease, resulting from different causes: qi ye 氣噎 , gullet occlusion by qi; you ye 憂噎 , gullet occlusion by anxiety; shi ye 食噎 , gullet occlusion by food; lao ye 勞噎 , gullet occlusionby exhaustion; si ye 思噎 , gullet occlusion by pondering. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 20: 夫五噎， 謂一曰氣噎，二曰憂噎，三曰食噎，四曰勞噎，五曰思噎 , “Now, as for the five types of gullet occlusion , the first is called gullet occlusion by qi, the second is called gullet occlusion by anxiety, the third is called gullet occlusion by food, the fourth is called gullet occlusion by exhaustion, the fifth is called gullet occlusion by pondering”.
